description: Comprehensive rules ecosystem for The Everything Gateway project and all sub-projects

core_principles.1_auto_push: Always push changes automatically without confirmation prompts
core_principles.2_lightweight: Keep everything minimal, clean, and efficient
core_principles.3_user_focus: Optimize for user experience and accessibility
core_principles.4_consistency: Maintain consistent patterns across all components
core_principles.5_scalability: Design systems that grow with the project

key_commands.deploy: git add . && git commit -m '[message]' && git push
key_commands.discord_bot: Check discord-bot/ folder for management scripts
